author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Khushi and Jhanvi PICTURES: Pics: Sridevi‚Äôs daughters Khushi and Jhanvi turn muse for Manish Malhotra at a grand wedding
text:
Sridevi 's daughters Khushi and Jhanvi made heads turns at a recent wedding reception in Hyderabad. The Kapoor ladies stole all the attention at the function, looking ethereal as they strutted around in gorgeous Manish Malhotra ensembles.
It was a three-woman-show as the ladies turned the reception hall into a fashion runway, with their fairly tale inspired outfits. Be it wearing handcrafted embroidered lehengas or sheer flowing gowns or elegant traditional handloom textile pieces, the Kapoor girls looked nothing less than ravishing. While Khushi and Jhanvi played princesses for a night, mommy Sridevi glistened in a series of golden ensembles that she paired with heavy jewelry.
Scroll below to see the pictures:
